parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma 3
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes backpack from a unit. (even non-local)

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''removeBackpackGlobal''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - soldier

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[removeBackpackGlobal]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[removeBackpack]], [[backpackContainer]], [[firstBackpack]], [[unitBackpack]], [[backpack]], [[backpackCargo]], [[getBackpackCargo]], [[backpackItems]], [[addBackpack]], [[addBackpackCargo]], [[addBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[clearBackpackCargo]], [[clearBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[clearAllItemsFromBackpack]], [[loadBackpack]], [[backpackSpaceFor]], [[canAddItemToBackpack]], [[addItemToBackpack]], [[removeItemFromBackpack]], [[everyBackpack]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on May 8, 2016 - 18:00 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:IT07|IT07]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Because of AG (Arguments Global), you can use this command to remove the backpack from UNITS that are local as well as REMOTE.
<code>[[removeBackpackGlobal]] UNIT;</code> where UNIT can be a local and/or REMOTE player and/or AI
</dd>
</dl>
